title: Optus users may have intermittent issues connecting to game....
body:
Didnt realise that this would also mean Im completely unable to play the game. Its all fine and dandy in queue and champ select but once I hit loading screen OHOHO CRASH. I really enjoy playing league and this issue has been up since yesterday. 

Plz rito. Fix gamu :c
Anyone else havin this issue, let's go cry about all the potential games we could have played :c
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: I have the same problem ;-;{{sticker:sg-janna}} except I managed to join back and help me team win BUT RIOT WONT GIVE ME MY REWARDS AFTER DCING FOR 5 MINUTES AND THEN PLAYING FOR 40 MiNUTES
Riot won't give anything back. it's nothing new for them.
They completed one of my missions for me
Optus is a fucking joke, we got the NBN plan then we call up because we have been paying for a phone plan we didn't ask for or order, and the guy tells us we don't have NBN, absolute cocks.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/iu8pdy0q-for-optus-users

Can you do that so it pushes it forward faster? Thanks!

Also it's not on riots end they can't do much for us unfortunately, i've been bored for 2 days ugh

How do I add the link now? ;-;
{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Only once you create a new thread do you have the option to, can't be done through edit XD, delete and make a new post or something if you want
